section.title:
configuration
of a/p module Configure A/P
section.para: To configure the Accounts Payable (A/P) module, select the "Configure A/P" option. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the A/P module, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: The next sequentially available Accounts Payable Memo Number will display here. You may change the number--creating a new basis for the next A/P Memo Number--by typing the new number into this field.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Cancels any configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
Saves the configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
